resources.string:
A simple game for improving your memory
 and compete against your friends. You simply
 have to find and match the pairs in order to
 "empty" the table as fast as possible. At
 the upper right menu you can select how
 many rounds to play each time, see the saved
 highscores and reset them if you want. If
 at any time the game loses focus by another
 application or minimizes afterwards the
 chronometer continues from the exact point
 it was left.
 Enjoy, review, comment and share. Thanks
 for trying the application!

 Author: Aristeidis Tomaras
